document_data.caption: A map showing Slingshot Way in southern Zhentil Keep.
document_data.name: Slingshot Way
document_data.mainbody: '''Slingshot Way''' was a street located in the city of [[Zhentil Keep]] during the midâ€“14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Location: Located in southern Zhentil Keep within the [[Zhentil Keep/Foreign Quarter|Foreign Quarter]] on the southern bank of the [[River Tesh]], Slingshot Way was a small road in the western section of the Foreign Quarter that passed perpendicular to the [[River Trail Gate]]. [[Twilight Street]] connected to the southern end of Slingshot Way.
